m_szDocSumamry: You Can Now Buy Victoria's Secret Lingerie With Bitcoins Julie Bort, provided by Published 6:12Â pm, Monday, December 23, 2013 You can buy a house with bitcoins , a Tesla electric car , a trip into outer space on Richard Branson's Virgin Galactic airline , and all kinds of other things from pizza to illegal drugs . And now, you can use bitcoin to buy Victoria's Secret lingerie via a gift card from Gyft , the app that replaces physical gift cards.
